entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local smoke. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
